Some work has been directed at better defining professional service firms (PSF). In particular, Von Nordenflycht generated a taxonomy of professional service firms, defining four types:

1.Classic PSFs (e.g. law and accounting firms): characterised by a high knowledge intensity, a professionalized workforce, and low capital intensity

2.Professional campuses (e.g. hospitals): characterised by a high knowledge intensity, a professionalised workforce, and high capital intensity

3.Neo-PSFs (e.g. management consultants): characterised by a high knowledge intensity and a low capital intensity

4.Technology developers (e.g. R&D firms, biotechs): characterised by a high knowledge intensity and a high capital intensity

你指邊款?

replies.msg:
見你係手足份上答吓你，點解big4 叫big4，big4 有幾big 4, 呢兩條問題就唔會答你，因為有得google 同wiki，同埋呢位手足呢度recruitment ，好明顯唔係吹你想知既topic 水

一般黎講fg 入big 4最大路分為tax 、audit (audit 同會計唔係同一樣野，自行google )、tax 同consulting

點解讀econ 想入big4 ，第一個最重要原因係畢業要搵工，咪9報

講咗audit 先，因為big4 對non accounting grad 既人最friendly ，佢會比埋錢你上conversion ，讀咗conversion 先，仲會比study leave 你去考試，非accounting grad 唔入big4好難考牌

但以上堆野係廢話，因為每年big4 audit 收好多人，所以好多人,仲有我無見過人真心鐘意auditing ，好想入big4 auditing

至於咩係consulting ，自己google ，就不嬲都有競爭，所以你朋友可能想入consulting ，唔一定係audit

睇你用字似係中學生，上面既人真係無屌你，呢問個兩樣真係有得google , 仲細個唔好比自己成為一個真連登仔
